flawed_nl_solution:
Tom is 32+5=<<32+5=37>>37 years old
So 7 years ago he was 37-7=<<37-7=26>>26 years old
Half of his age was 26/2=<<26/2=13>>13 years old
So 7 years ago Jim was 13+5=18
So he is now 18+7=<<18+7=25>>25 years old
That means in 2 years he will be 25+2=<<25+2=27>>27 years old
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
